content: this is a fun pair of fingerless gloves with fitted arms and lots of small textural details the gloves are knit in the round from the cuff down to the hands with the thumb worked at the end **note** the pattern contains tips on making a shorter pair of gloves if you want to make the gloves longer there are three places that you can easily add row 1 at the wrist after the decreases before the thumb 2 after the thumb in the hand area 3 arm area before decreases
